DataElement.preferredName: Metastatic Lymph Node Short Axis Measurement Requirement Met Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine whether or not the line through and perpendicular to the long axis of a tumor which has extended from it's original site of grown to another anatomic site met a specific size expectation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Metastatic Lymph Node Short Axis Measurement Requirement Fulfill
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A term referring to the clinical or pathologic observation of a tumor extension from its original site of growth to another anatomic site._A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection._Line through and perpendicular to an object's long axis. This line may intersect the long axis anywhere within the object._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A term referring to the clinical or pathologic observation of a tumor extension from its original site of growth to another anatomic site.:A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.

Concepts.definition: A term referring to the clinical or pathologic observation of a tumor extension from its original site of growth to another anatomic site.

A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.

Property.preferredDefinition: Line through and perpendicular to an object's long axis. Concepts.definition: Line through and perpendicular to an object's long axis. This line may intersect the long axis anywhere within the object.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
